overview:
25 years of unique commercial real estate, technology, professional services, Fortune 500, innovation and entrepreneurial experience in 20 countries:

  • Founded CREOpoint.com, the online meeting point exclusively for commercial real estate leaders worldwide

  • Former Executive Director, Global Solutions for NAI Global, a leading real estate service provider with 370 offices around the world ($50 billion in transactions in 2007)

  • Played a key role in the United States and in Europe for Ernst & Young: Managed the start-up of E&Y European marketing and planning group and co-founded E& Y cross-border real estate consulting practice. Advised multinationals and services firms in the assessment, adaptation and implementation of their strategies. Developed alliances, new services and cross-selling programs.

  • An entrepreneur, who also founded and led a specialist business development consulting firm and a developer of web-enabled decision support software.

  • A team player with proven ability to manage complex projects and people in multi-cultural environments (worked in 20 countries).

  • Speaker at international conferences like MIPIM and RealComm and quoted in publications such as the Wall St Journal, the Financial Times, Crains, REIT.com, all site selection magazines, Commercial Property News, GlobeSt and National Real Estate Investor.

  • Holds masters degrees in business administration (MBA obtained in California) and aerospace engineering (Sup’Aero).
